top_comments.comment: This is how communist system started in Russia-Ukraine!!! First they took a hold of schools to brainwash kids into believing there’s no God and that the communist party are Gods and you have to bow down to them!!! Parents please fight for your kids freedom in schools!!!🙏

comments_since_last_sample.body: Many parents including me trusted the public schools and never dreamed the nice teachers would do anything bad to our kids. Now that we’ve seen it, we’re paying close attention and it gets scarier the more you dig. They are training our kids to be woke activists. This is child abuse and we’re coming for you.
Not those parents that supported  and continue to support Trump...
